markdown: **Activate** <actions string="" />(1 minute) Interact;     **Effect** You place the _gourd home_ on the ground (in an open area large enough to contain it) and cause it to expand in size to a 30-foot-square structure with one door. The interior of the gourd is a single large room that can hold 10 Small or Medium creatures with moderate comfort.
name: (1 minute) Interact

text: Activate (1 minute) Interact; Effect You place the gourd home on the ground (in an open area large enough to contain it) and cause it to expand in size to a 30-foot-square structure with one door. The interior of the gourd is a single large room that can hold 10 Small or Medium creatures with moderate comfort.
